name: Focus
description: Snapchat needed an innovative, best-in-class learning experience and product to support enterprise audiences utilizing their Ads Manager within their ForBusiness ecosystem.

name: For Games
description: Marketing site to centralize all Google company-wide Games intiatives into one place for the Games Industry.

name: Smart Home Training
description: An interactive gamified digital learning experience, teaching users about the various use-cases of Google products within a house.

name: In-store Kiosk
description: Albertsons, a leading grocery retailer, wanted to improve the employee experience, including hiring. After conducting extensive field research about the employee experience and journey, we found that many employees had difficulty finding out about the jobs available and their requirements. They also had difficulty applying using paper forms or complex online multi-steps forms.
We designed and prototyped a touchscreen hiring terminal for stores, which allowed prospective employees to browse and find about different roles, and then apply to job positions there and then.

name: Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome extension that replaces LinkedIn profile photos and names with geometric patterns, removing any potential bias when reviewing job applicants.

name: Brand Hub
description: Audited, architected and prototyped the new brand hub for Reviewed.com including assesments for performance, speed, accessbility and more.

name: Loyalty Innovation
description: Albertsons, a leading grocery retailer, wanted
to identify new ways to generate customer stickiness and brand affinity beyond its current deals, discounts, and rewards program.

name: Investor Dashboard
description: Machine-learning dashboard showing realtime news rated by relevance to investments

name: Guided Meditation
description: A guided meditation room, that guides newcomers in mindfulness, supports independent meditation, and offers an environment for quick rest.

name: Stories Player
description: Built web player to stream video stories and instantly seek between chapters

name: Co-living Platform
description: Designed and built a realtime collaboration platform for residents in Sweden to share and book facilities

name: Data Dashboard
description: Led a team to architect and engineer a large data dashboard which scans, stores and reports on millions of rows of data.

name: Differentiation
description: Brought together several teams, and designed a custom Design Thinking framework to identify and develop opportunities for new products and services.

name: Carbon Calculator
description: Interactive quiz and results allowing visitors to calculate & share their carbon footprint

name: Buy Flow
description: Google wanted to sell hardware products directly to Enterprise customer. The existing Google Store was not able to account for more the complex license and bulk purchasing options required.
We designed and built a custom storefront which adhered to Google’s design and technology standards. This included customer accounts, baskets and orders sent to approved fulfilment partners.\
We versioned the Buy Flow for multiple hardware products including Chrome for Work, Jamboard US & UK, and Hangouts Meet.

name: Product Innovation
description: Re-imagine the future of digital advertising by validating new and innovative ad revenue streams.

name: Jay Chatbot
description: Created a prototype chatbot which detected entites in natual language and delivered back relevant news in a conversational format.

name: Marketing Sites
description: Increase traffic to online stores by improving top-of-funnel content and journeying through a new marketing sites

name: Experiential Shopping
description: west elm wanted to re-imagine the online visual shopping experience to increase conversions, making online as emotionally fulfilling as the in-store, catalogue and social experience.

name: Instant Video
description: Increase click-through rates of YouTube Ads by creating an app for Advertisers to quickly shoot, edit and upload videos

name: Launchpad
description: Architected and built a kickstarter-style platform for kids around the world to collaborate on projects to change the world.

name: Workspace
description: Built B2B ecommerce platform with easy checkout basket

name: Supply Chain Tools
description: Upgraded a series of internal platforms aimed at improving their global supply chain of digital and physical video masters

name: Brand Hub
description: Architected and built the home of the $3 billion brand with CMS and static generation

name: Photobooth
description: Built 4 different photobooth experiences with interactive photography, submissions and games

name: Together in HF
description: Partnered with Digital Innovation team to create a support network for patients suffering from Heart Failure

name: Brand Hub
description: Created a thought-leadership hub for the parent brand, with connections to all the other Virgin brands

name: 3D Scanner
description: Prototyped a 3D Scanning tool using web technologies and a proprietary scanning algorithm. Using Google Auth, conducting multiple scans and storing them in Google Cloud storage, allowing users to browse through previous scans.

name: Living Archive
description: Immersive stories featuring assets from theirs archives

name: Hackathon
description: Organized and ran a hackathon to crowdsource mobile health ideas and solutions to quickly address issues for patients with heart-failure

name: Brandcast Event App
description: Once a year, YouTube pulls out all the stops to showcase its unique programming line-up and original content in a big way, giving advertisers a glimpse of its loyal audience of amateur video creators at a spectacular event called YouTube Brandcast.

We designed and built a mobile app for attendees to get venue information, event schedules and coverage in realtime. The app acts as a personal slideshow display for the keynote speaker. During keynote speeches, speaker’s slides were pushed to audience members’ mobile devices.

name: Data Cockpit
description: Created a dynamic dashboard which aggregated and displayed data from several sources

name: Microsites
description: Built 4+ microsites for various Facebook properties including Sustainability, Security, Newsroom and Investor Relations

name: Olympics Map
description: Interactive map of London 2012 Olympics with games and information built ontop of Bing Maps

name: Zeitgeist Minds
description: An interactive archive of Ted-X-style talks from influential speakers around the world including, transcripts, chapters and more

name: News App
description: Prototyped a dynamic multi-column layout which could adapt to mobile/tablet/desktop dimensions whilst providing amounts of editorial control

name: Virtual Trophy
description: Created an augmented reality experience allowing anyone to lift the Barclays Premier League Trophy and take a picture.

name: Interactive Channels
description: Created 40+ interactive microsites for YouTube and it's partners including features such as livestreams, maps, chat, remixers, polls, competitions, quizzes, voting, forms, webcams and timelines

name: iAds
description: For four years we were Apple’s exclusive EMEA partner, creating compelling interactive mobile experiences for the world’s leading brands such as Guinness, BMW, Renault, Proctor and Gamble using Apple’s iAds platform.

We partnered and provided UX and creative support to media buyers looking to create exceptional iAd experiences. For Jaguar and BMW we created and built responsive iAd which allow users to see what it feels like to sit behind the wheel of one of their brand new cars.

name: Interactive Microsites
description: Designed and built 12+ interactive microsites for MTV and their partner brands including videos, games, quizzes, downloads, competitions and forms

name: Interactive Games
description: Designed and built multiple games and microsites for Baraem kids TV channel

name: Training & Engagement
description: Designed and built 10+ training and engagement for global employee initiatives including interactive globes, maps, animations, awards, statistics, videos and forms

name: British Grand Prix
description: Designed and built 3+ interactive games for the British Grand Prix with timed competitions and leaderboards
